column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Been to this location multiple times and each time pretty constant with good customer serve and food quality even in high traffic times. Me and a friend drive 45 mins for what i can say is an all in all great experience. We usually order the JINYA bun which I highly recommend if you like pork. I have also gotten the pot stickers
column2: fried creamy spicy shrimp as well as the the spicy tonkotsu ramen which are all delicious and always fresh. If you are in the mood for a cocktail that is light
column3: smooth & sweet get the cherry blossom- you will not be disappointed. Highly recommend
